answers.answer: I am a STRONG believer in the theory of "drug-induced" diabetes.  The Internet is full of info on the subject, which I found out when my husband's blood sugar rose dramatically while taking a blood pressure med plus diuretic.  I caught on to the problem and had the doctor change his meds, but my own rising blood sugar was not caught in time and I am now a diabetic.  However, I determined to control the condition without taking insulin in any form.  I eat my heaviest meal between noon and 1:00pm, eat lightly between 4:00 and 5:00pm, and exercise for 20 mins before going to bed.
